        public Z4Shape2DPainter​(Z4FancifulValue width,
                        Z4FancifulValue height,
                        boolean regular,
                        boolean star,
                        int vertices,
                        Z4FancifulValue shadowShiftX,
                        Z4FancifulValue shadowShiftY,
                        javascript.awt.Color shadowColor,
                        Z4FancifulValue borderWidth,
                        Z4FancifulValue borderHeight,
                        javascript.awt.Color borderColor)
        Creates the object
        Parameters:
        width - The width
        height - The height
        regular - true if the shape is regular (width = height), false otherwise
        star - true if the shape is a star, false otherwise
        vertices - The number of vertices, -1 for an ellipse
        shadowShiftX - The X shadow shift
        shadowShiftY - The Y shadow shift
        shadowColor - The shadow color
        borderWidth - The border width
        borderHeight - The border height
        borderColor - The border color
